domain.name: Person

domain.description: Top level interests and hobbies groupings, like Food or Travel

domain.name: Political Body
domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text:
@realDonaldTrump The US military is hit by over 5000 #covid19 infections. @realdonaldtrump should attend to their needs, not engage in threats cheered on by Saddam's terrorists.
Also, US forces have no business 7,000 miles away from home, provoking our sailors off our OWN #PersianGulf shores
